level.heading: Immunization standards; list of immunizations.
level.text: The Mayor shall, by regulations, specify the immunization standards to be used for compliance with this chapter, and may also, by regulation, revise the list of requested immunizations.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-20, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-501.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority pursuant to D.C. Law 3-20, the Immunization of School Students Act of 1979, see Mayor's Order 2006-117, September 5, 2006 (53 DCR 7553).
